intro.description:
We've got a Debrief plot file pre-prepared to let you avoid some of the steps in the single-leg tutorial, called L2_Scenario.dpf.
For this file we have a good set of ownship data for the ownship track, but we didn't get GPS data for the other participant - though the exercise observer did record the platform speed during the trial.

item.title: Find the data file
item.description: The data-file for this tutorial is contained in the SATC sub-folder, as were the files used in the previous tutorial.

item.title: Drag in the file
item.description:
Before you load the data-file, close any existing Debrief plots, then drag in the L2_Scenario.dpf data-file from the SATC folder we used in the previous tutorial.
You will see a Blue Ownship track, with a dark green bearing fan.
